channel.title: Hidden Webserver error
channel.description:
Been playing around with Whonix 9 and came across this https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Hidden_Services
typing in sudo nano /etc/tor/torrc and then the following lines at the bottom
HiddenServiceDir /var/lib/tor/hidden_service/ HiddenServicePort 80 10.152.152.11 :80
http://i.imgur.com/H7aMtfK.jpg
brings up this error http://i.imgur.com/tiMYN9v.jpg
Also, nice article about torrents in whonix. I'd still recommend using a good VPN so you don't kill the tor network :P

item.title: Hidden Webserver error
item.dc:creator: TurtleMan
item.description:
Been playing around with Whonix 9 and came across this https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Hidden_Services

typing in sudo nano /etc/tor/torrc and then the following lines at the bottom

HiddenServiceDir /var/lib/tor/hidden_service/
HiddenServicePort 80 10.152.152.11 :80

brings up this error

Also, nice article about torrents in whonix. I’d still recommend using a good VPN so you don’t kill the tor network
